Kyoto Details

Immerse yourself in Kyoto’s serene temples, traditional tea houses, and exquisite gardens. Experience the timeless beauty and enduring cultural heritage of Japan’s ancient capital.

Transport & Connectivity

Kyoto is exceptionally well connected by JR trains and local bus routes. The JR Kyoto Station serves as a major transit hub for intercity travel, while intimate bus routes and even bicycle rentals let you explore its historical districts with ease.

Hotel Recommendations

  • Hotel Granvia Kyoto
  • The Ritz-Carlton Kyoto
  • Kyoto Hotel Okura

Hiroshima Details

Learn about Hiroshima’s resilient history and poignant memorials. Explore the Peace Park, informative museums, and modern cityscapes that honor the past.

Transport & Connectivity

Hiroshima is easily reached via the Shinkansen from Osaka or Kyoto. Once in the city, a reliable tram network along with local buses and taxis ensures that all key historical sites – including the Peace Memorial Park – are within easy reach.

Hotel Recommendations

  • Sheraton Grand Hiroshima Hotel
  • Rihga Royal Hotel Hiroshima
  • Hotel Granvia Hiroshima
